item.description:
After finishing Saturday's hike on the Lincoln Woods Trail (http://www.meetup.com/New-England-Hiking-Meetup/events/16328766/) I am going to be staying at the White Mountains Hostel in Conway.  I plan to hike the Boulder Loop Trail on Sunday...start time will be 10:00am.  This is a very cool, not too long hike in Albany, NH with neat ledges and some good views.   There are lots of other hikes in the area to choose from!  Or you can explore Conway's shops - there are outlets and antique shops galore.

I plan to stay at the hostel Saturday and Sunday and leave early Monday morning.  There is a full kitchen, so if we have a group, we can make ourselves an awesome spaghetti dinner with some crusty bread, salad and a bottle of Chianti on Saturday night.  Sunday night, I plan to eat out and maybe find a local pub.

To reserve a bunk at the hostel, you can call them directly or book via www.hostels.com.

Info about the hostel is here: http://www.whitemountainshostel.com/index.html

Info about the Boulder Loop trail is here: http://www.hikenewengland.com/BoulderLoopNH100214.html

When you RSVP, please let me know if you're staying one or two nights at the hostel.  If you just want to do the hike on Sunday, let me know that, too! 

Hope some of you join me!
item.name: Weekend in Conway - with hike!
